summaryEn.noApplicationsOfThisType: There are no procedures of this type against the set criteria
summaryEn.onGoingApplications: 2. PROCEDURES IN THE COURSE OF IMPLEMENTATION:

common.threatType: Type of imminent threat of environmental damage (according to Article 4 of the ZOPOESHT:
common.damageType: Type of environmental damage caused (according to Article 4 of the ZOPOESHT)
common.threatDate: Date of occurrence of the unconfirmed threat of environmental damage and/or the date on which this was established
common.damageDate: Date of occurrence of the environmental damage caused and/or the date on which this was established
common.activityOffering: Activity, as defined in application №1 of ZOPOESHT, resulting in environmental damage
common.threatDateProcedure: Date on which the procedure to prevent the imminent threat of environmental damage was initiated
common.damageDateProcedure: Date on which the procedure to remedy the environmental damage was initiated
common.applicantThreat: Applicant for the procedure to prevent the imminent threat of environmental damage
common.applicantDamage: Applicant for the procedure for remedying environmental damage
